price: O my people, who would protect me from Allah if I were to dismiss them? Will you not then take heed?
arabic: وَيَٰقَوۡمِ مَن يَنصُرُنِي مِنَ ٱللَّهِ إِن طَرَدتُّهُمۡۚ أَفَلَا تَذَكَّرُونَ

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
